content: That's a great point about the coffee roast levels. I think I'll offer a medium and a dark roast coffee option to cater to different tastes. Since I grabbed a quick chai tea latte from the food truck that parks outside our office building during lunch on Wednesday, I'm familiar with the flavors of chai and I think it will pair well with the medium roast coffee. The dark roast coffee will provide a nice contrast for those who prefer a bolder flavor.
